markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Slopes](/Rules.aspx?ID=609)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 514 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Slopes vary from the gentle rises of normal terrain to difficult terrain and inclines, depending on the angle of elevation. Moving down a slope is typically normal terrain, but characters might need to Climb up particularly steep slopes.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Slopes
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 514 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Chapter 10: Game Mastering / Environment / Mountain
</additional-info>
text: Slopes Source Core Rulebook pg. 514 4.0 Slopes vary from the gentle rises of normal terrain to difficult terrain and inclines, depending on the angle of elevation. Moving down a slope is typically normal terrain, but characters might need to Climb up particularly steep slopes.
